credit_line: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
title: Africa
description: Deep flaring goblet with figures of the Four Continents in circular medallions between scrolls. Asia with camel; Europe with horse; Africa with faun(?); monkey, lion, and elephant; America with arrow, bird, and puma. After the frontispiece to "Thesauri Philo-Politici Tertia Pars," Frankfort, 1623, attributed to George Keller (1568-1635). Cut baluster stem, engraved foot.
name: Standing Cup
